page.title: 02FEATURES OF LUSTON AREA
page.content: {Luston}is a little village just about three miles from Leominster.It is surrounded by farmland & rolling countryside.Near by are various smaller villages and houses scattered along the wayside.{Eye church}is one of the central points of the life of the villagers, as is the village {Primary School}where the recently formed{Brownie Pack}meet once a week.The school hall is also used by the Leominster Evening Institute who hold a{Women's Keep Fit class}there once a week. In our survey we have looked at aspects of farming,education in our area,recent important events, life styles in 1985 and employment.We have also looked at the clubs that people attend,some customs of 1985 and {Berrington Hall} which is the only place of interest open to the public in our area.
